mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (member_id, broker_id, broker_name, start_time, end_time, status, client_memo, broker_memo) SELECT #{memberId}, #{brokerId}, b.broker_name, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, #{clientMemo}, #{brokerMemo} FROM broker b WHERE b.bid = #{brokerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation r INNER JOIN broker b ON b.bid = #{brokerId} SET r.broker_id = #{brokerId}, r.broker_name = b.broker_name, r.start_time = #{startTime}, r.end_time = #{endTime}, r.client_memo = #{clientMemo}, r.broker_memo = #{brokerMemo}, r.status = #{status}, r.updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE r.rid = #{rid} AND r.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation_estate (reservation_id, estate_id, memo) VALUES (#{reservationId}, #{estateId}, #{memo})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, b.broker_name AS brokerName FROM reservation r JOIN broker b ON r.broker_id = b.bid WHERE r.rid = #{rid}
